backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor with extensive data types for blog posts, store items, meetings, MP3 tracks, livestreams, links, analytics, and homepage content, and initializes multiple storage maps.
backend/migration.mo: Adds a new dailyVisitors map to analytics data during migration by extending the old actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for analytics updates, daily visitor tracking, and corresponding frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app’s router, theme provider, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client with routes for home and admin.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsM: Displays analytics fetched from the backend and renders multiple charts and summaries for visits, clicks, section views, and daily visitors.
frontend/src/components/admin/BlogManage: Provides UI to create, list, edit, and delete blog posts including image uploads and markdown insertion.
frontend/src/components/admin/EBookManag: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/admin/LinksManag: Manages creation, editing, deletion, ordering, and visibility of link buttons with validation and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/Livestream: Handles creation, editing, visibility toggling, and deletion of livestream entries with date/time handling and form validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/MeetingMan: Allows admins to create meeting slots and view existing appointments and slots with date/time conversion and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Mp3PlayerM: Admin UI for creating playlists, uploading MP3 tracks with metadata, toggling visibility, deleting tracks, and reordering them.
frontend/src/components/admin/PageManage: Manages homepage sections including creation, editing, deletion, reordering, and visibility toggling.
frontend/src/components/admin/StoreItemM: Form-driven admin tool for adding store items with images, pricing, product types, and previews.
frontend/src/components/BlogPostModal.ts: Displays a blog post in a modal with rich content rendering and admin inline editing support.
frontend/src/components/BlogSection.tsx: Fetches and displays blog posts in a grid with editable section headers and click-tracking analytics.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Modal for booking a meeting slot, handling name input, date formatting, and async appointment creation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/CustomSection.ts: Wrapper section that renders a homepage section and enables admin editing via EditableCustomSection.
frontend/src/components/EBookSection.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/EditableCustomSe: Admin-editable homepage section allowing title and description editing with save/cancel logic and mutation calls.
Generic editable section for various site content keys, supporting admin editing and saving updated titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying site footer content with admin edit mode for updating the footer text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with authentication, admin quick-edit support, and editable business title handling via mutations.
frontend/src/components/InlineEditBlogPo: Inline blog post editor with autosave, manual save, file uploads (including image markdown insertion), and delete dialog handling.
Provides inline editing for eBook store items with auto‑save after inactivity and manual save validation.
frontend/src/components/InlineEditLink.t: Enables editing, auto‑saving, and deletion of link items with URL validation and admin controls.
frontend/src/components/InlineEditLivest: Handles inline editing of livestream details including scheduling, auto‑save, manual save, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/InlineEditMeetin: Supports editing meeting slot descriptions with change detection, auto‑save, and manual save actions.
frontend/src/components/InlineEditStoreI: Allows editing generic store items with auto‑save, manual save, and product type handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, routed content, and conditional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/LinksSection.tsx: Renders a list of external links with admin editing support, visibility filtering, and click tracking.
frontend/src/components/LivestreamSectio: Displays livestream cards with date/time formatting, admin‑only visibility, and external link tracking.
frontend/src/components/MeetingSection.t: Shows bookable meeting slots, opens a booking modal, and tracks user interactions.
frontend/src/components/Mp3PlayerSection: Implements an audio player with playlists, playback controls, looping, and play‑count tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a user's name and email with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/QuickEditOverlay: Admin search-and-edit overlay allowing quick filtering and inline editing across multiple content types.
frontend/src/components/StoreItemSection: Displays store items with product type labels, image previews, and click‑tracking for analytics.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for CRUD operations across blog posts, store items, homepage sections, mp3 data, and other app entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with authentication checks and tabbed management sections for site content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage sections dynamically and tracks visits, section views, and unique visitors.
Provides helpers for generating visitor session IDs and tracking daily visits using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using URL parsing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme variables, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores overall project state including versioning, a high-level system summary, and a list of defined features with metadata. Acts as a structured registry of implemented functionality across the website/CMS.
